tasks.task_description: Implement flattening service for contact data transformation
Create unit tests for flattening service
Implement matching service with core algorithm
Create unit tests for matching service
Test matching with real contact data
Deploy updated services with matching capability

description: Phase 3 Core Services Implementation - Flattening and Matching services for founder-investor matching system
context: Implemented matching service with core algorithm. Includes contact scoring, attribute overlap tracking, contact type filtering, and pagination. Ready for testing.
Added matching endpoint to contact-service. Route: GET /contacts/:id/matches with targetType and limit query parameters. Ready for deployment and testing.

Matching algorithm WORKING PERFECTLY! Alice Founder matched with 5 investors, all with score 10. Shows detailed attribute overlaps including skills, industries, verticals, etc. Core business logic validated!
